targets.query: SELECT "he" FROM "flib_data" WHERE ("data_sel" != '"disable"' AND "host" =~ /^$get_hosts$/ AND "flib" =~ /^$get_flibs$/ AND "he" = true) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "se" FROM "flib_data" WHERE ("data_sel" != '"disable"' AND "host" =~ /^$get_hosts$/ AND "flib" =~ /^$get_flibs$/ AND "se" = true) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "eo" FROM "flib_data" WHERE ("data_sel" != '"disable"' AND "host" =~ /^$get_hosts$/ AND "flib" =~ /^$get_flibs$/ AND "eo" = true) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "do" FROM "flib_data" WHERE ("data_sel" != '"disable"' AND "host" =~ /^$get_hosts$/ AND "flib" =~ /^$get_flibs$/ AND "do" = true) AND $timeFilter

panels.description:
Table of links with data select as "link" and link up as "down", given as an error condition.
Shows table on occurance

targets.query: SELECT "flib","link","data_sel","up" FROM "flib_data" WHERE ("flib" =~ /^$get_flibs$/ AND "host" =~ /^$get_hosts$/ AND "data_sel" = '"link"' AND "up" = false) AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Data Select "Link" & Link Down

panels.description:
idle: 
PCIe interface is idle (ratio)
stall: 
back pressure on PCIe interface from host (ratio)
trans:
data is transmitted via PCIe interface (ratio)
panels.title: PCI Transmit

panels.description:
idle: 
PCIe interface is idle (ratio)
stall: 
back pressure on PCIe interface from host (ratio)
trans:
data is transmitted via PCIe interface (ratio)
panels.title: PCI Idle

panels.description:
idle: 
PCIe interface is idle (ratio)
stall: 
back pressure on PCIe interface from host (ratio)
trans:
data is transmitted via PCIe interface (ratio)
panels.title: PCI Stall

targets.query: SELECT "flib","link","he", "se", "eo", "do" FROM "flib_data" WHERE ("flib" =~ /^$get_flibs$/ AND "host" =~ /^$get_hosts$/ AND "data_sel" != '"disable"' AND "he" = true OR "se" = true OR "eo" = true OR "do" = true) AND $timeFilter
